comments.body: These "-------" lines will actually make the previous line appear like a header in a markdown cell, so it is fine (the text will be bigger).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +38,42 @@
# Generate events

data = gauss.generate(ROOT.RooArgSet(x), 10000)  # ROOT.RooDataSet
